name: @egarcia74/warp-sql-server-mcp
description: Secure MCP server for connecting Warp to SQL Server with graduated safety levels and comprehensive database operations

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && node scripts/test-summary.js
scripts.test:integration: npm run docker:start:init && npm run test:integration:run && npm run docker:stop
scripts.test:integration:run: npm run test:integration:manual && npm run test:integration:protocol && npm run test:integration:performance
scripts.test:integration:manual: MCP_TESTING_MODE=docker node test/integration/manual/phase1-readonly-security.test.js && MCP_TESTING_MODE=docker node test/integration/manual/phase2-dml-operations.test.js && MCP_TESTING_MODE=docker node test/integration/manual/phase3-ddl-operations.test.js
scripts.test:integration:ci: echo 'âš ï¸  This requires a running SQL Server on localhost:1433 with SA password WarpMCP123!' && npm run test:integration:run
scripts.docker:start: TESTING_MODE=true npm run docker:detect && echo 'ðŸ³ Starting optimized SQL Server container...' && docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm run docker:wait
scripts.docker:start:verbose: npm run docker:detect && echo 'ðŸ³ Starting optimized SQL Server container...' && docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm run docker:wait
scripts.docker:start:init: npm run docker:start && npm run docker:init || (echo 'âŒ Docker initialization failed - see errors above' && exit 1)
scripts.docker:start:verbose:init: npm run docker:start:verbose && npm run docker:init || (echo 'âŒ Docker initialization failed - see errors above' && exit 1)
scripts.docker:init: echo 'ðŸ”§ Initializing database schema...' && docker exec warp-mcp-sqlserver /opt/mssql-tools18/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P WarpMCP123! -C -b -i /tmp/init-db.sql && echo 'âœ… Database initialization completed successfully' || (echo 'âŒ Database initialization FAILED - check logs above' && exit 1)
scripts.docker:stop: echo 'ðŸ”´ Stopping SQL Server container...' && docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:reset: echo 'ðŸ”„ Resetting SQL Server container with fresh data...' && npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:sql: docker exec -it warp-mcp-sqlserver /opt/mssql-tools18/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P WarpMCP123! -C
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:extract && npm run docs:generate-tools && npm run docs:generate-landing
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run markdown:lint && npm test
scripts.prepush: npm run precommit && npm run security:audit
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run markdown:lint && npm run links:check:ci && npm run test:coverage && npm run security:audit

author: Eduardo Garcia-Prieto
